issue.title: olympustaff.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://olympustaff.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Folympustaff.com%2F) ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/cn7e5gqrtfcwwsossosgcc0wk0c0gc086kwsfhxdt8.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Mac v2.17.3.2020 release System version: | `MacOS 15.5 (Build 24F74)` Browser: | Safari Tracking protection: | **General settings**:
Block trackers,
Strip URLs from tracking parameters,
Hide your search queries,
Send Do-Not-Track header

**Tracking methods**:
Self-destructing third-party cookies (180)

**Browser API**:
Block Push API,
Block Location API,
Block Java

**Miscellaneous**:
Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests DNS filtering: | server: `System`
filters: `AdGuard DNS filter` Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base,
EasyList

Annoyances:
AdGuard Popups

Language-specific:
Liste AR Browsing Security: | enabled Browsing Security statistics: | disabled Userscripts: | `AdGuard Assistant (url: https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/assistant/4.3/assistant.user.js)`
`AdGuard Extra (url: https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js)` Userstyles: | disabled Referrer: | [https://olympustaff.com/series/demonic-emperor/749](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Folympustaff.com%2Fseries%2Fdemonic-emperor%2F749) ### Issue configuration [Import](https://reports.adguard.com/settings/import.html?product_type=mac&product_version=2.17.3.2020+release&system_version=MacOS+15.5+%28Build+24F74%29&browser=safari&filters=2.19.101.112&dns_servers=System&userscripts=AdGuard%2520Assistant%2520%28url%253A%2520https%253A%252F%252Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%252Frelease%252Fassistant%252F4.3%252Fassistant.user.js%29%252C%250AAdGuard%2520Extra%2520%28url%253A%2520https%253A%252F%252Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%252Frelease%252Fadguard-extra%252F1.0%252Fadguard-extra.user.js%29&userscripts_enabled=true&dns.filters=AdGuard%2520DNS%2520filter&dns.filters_enabled=true&dns.enabled=true&browsing_security_enabled=true&browsing_security_statistics_enabled=false&stealth.enabled=true&stealth.webrtc=false&stealth.push=true&stealth.location=true&stealth.java=true&stealth.strip_url=true&stealth.hide_search_queries=true&stealth.DNT=true&stealth.x_client=true&stealth.dpi=false&stealth.third_party_cookies=180&stealth.disable_third_party_cache=false&stealth.block_third_party_auth=false&stealth.block_trackers=true&referrer=https%253A%252F%252Folympustaff.com%252Fseries%252Fdemonic-emperor%252F749&scheme_version=3&is_third_party_cookies=true&is_first_party_cookies=false&is_referrer=false&is_user_agent=false)

issue.title: taurus.topmanhuas.org
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://taurus.topmanhuas.org/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Ftaurus.topmanhuas.org%2F) ### Comment > No deja entrar a sitio ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/a31sho78liosws8k0ow80wws44048oocarp2pfu69c.jpg?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Android v4.11 Nightly 8 System version: | `Android 15` Browser: | Chrome License type: | free AdGuard mode: | VPN HTTPS filtering: | enabled Tracking protection: | **General settings**:
Block trackers,
Send Do-Not-Track header

**Tracking methods**:
Self-destructing third-party cookies (180),
Self-destructing first-party cookies (4320)

**Miscellaneous**:
Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests DNS filtering: | server: `System`
filters: `https://filters.adtidy.org/android/filters/15_optimized.txt` Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Mobile Ads,
AdGuard Base,
EasyList

Social widgets:
AdGuard Social Media,
Fanboy's Social Blocking List

Other:
AdGuard Experimental,
AdGuard DNS,
Filter unblocking search ads and self-promotion,
Fanboy's Anti-thirdparty Fonts

Language-specific:
AdGuard Spanish/Portuguese,
AdGuard Japanese,
AdGuard Dutch,
AdGuard Chinese,
AdGuard Russian,
Xfiles,
ABPindo,
Greek AdBlock Filter,
EasyList China Browsing Security: | enabled Browsing Security statistics: | disabled Userscripts: | `https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.meta.js` Other extensions used: | `No tengo ninguno de esos`

issue.title: music.youtube.com

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://music.youtube.com/watch?v=2xyRCZaiG1Y&list=RDATflc21vb3RoIGpheno](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmusic.youtube.com%2Fwatch%3Fv%3D2xyRCZaiG1Y%26list%3DRDATflc21vb3RoIGpheno) ### Comment > AdGuard sometimes doesn't block ads, usually when you start a page you get ads, then after you manually block them, you're surprised that you can't see the videos, only the sound is heard. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/o5x2lmw66aswsss04cwkgo4ks8skscgphn4udjepi8.jpg?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser Extension v5.1.139 MV2 System version: | `Windows 11` Browser: | Firefox Tracking protection: | **General settings**:
Block trackers,
Strip URLs from tracking parameters,
Hide your search queries,
Send Do-Not-Track header

**Tracking methods**:
Self-destructing third-party cookies (2880)

**Browser API**:
Block WebRTC Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base,
EasyList

AdGuard Tracking Protection,
AdGuard URL Tracking

ROLIST2,
road-block light Browsing Security: | enabled Browsing Security statistics: | enabled ### Issue configuration [Import](https://reports.adguard.com/settings/import.html?product_type=ext&product_version=5.1.139&system_version=Windows+11&manifest_version=2&browser=firefox&filters=2.3.4.5.14.15.17.18.19.20.21.22.101.114.122.207.208.234.236.239.241.250.255.256.257&userscripts_enabled=false&browsing_security_enabled=true&browsing_security_statistics_enabled=true&stealth.enabled=true&stealth.webrtc=true&stealth.strip_url=true&stealth.hide_search_queries=true&stealth.DNT=true&stealth.third_party_cookies=2880&stealth.block_trackers=true&is_third_party_cookies=true&is_first_party_cookies=false&is_referrer=false&is_user_agent=false)

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://music.youtube.com/watch?v=QuNFG3Zt4-Q&list=PLIFgrF38LbFLyw8xyz5IHmtdLEs7F-4HN](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmusic.youtube.com%2Fwatch%3Fv%3DQuNFG3Zt4-Q%26list%3DPLIFgrF38LbFLyw8xyz5IHmtdLEs7F-4HN) ### Comment > Ads still show up when I use Youtube Music and Youtube ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/plrrzlmmmf408k0kg8ossowso84ccwoc0baxep86c0.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser Extension v5.1.141 MV3 System version: | `Windows 11` Browser: | Chrome Tracking protection: | disabled Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base

Other:
Filter unblocking search ads and self-promotion Browsing Security: | disabled Browsing Security statistics: | disabled Other extensions used: | `Rotten Tomato Destroyer, Google Docs Offline` ### Issue configuration [Import](https://reports.adguard.com/settings/import.html?product_type=ext&product_version=5.1.141&system_version=Windows+11&manifest_version=3&browser=chrome&filters=2.10&userscripts_enabled=false&browsing_security_enabled=false&browsing_security_statistics_enabled=false&stealth.enabled=false&is_third_party_cookies=false&is_first_party_cookies=false&is_referrer=false&is_user_agent=false)
